item.title: 去年秋天，V-22 "鱼鹰 "飞机在日本发生致命坠机事故，造成八名军人丧生，美国军方已解除对该飞机的禁飞令，为这种倾斜旋翼机三个月来的首次复飞铺平了道路。
item.description:
The U.S. military has lifted its flight ban on V-22 Osprey aircraft after a deadly crash in Japan killed eight service members last fall, paving the way for the tilt rotorcraft to fly again for the first time in three months. https://t.co/y3E5rW35dd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 2022 年，达米安-博斯切托偶然发现了一具距今 7000 万年的巨大化石，这竟然是一具几乎完整的长颈恐龙骨架。
item.description:
In 2022, Damien Boschetto stumbled upon a massive, 70 million-year-old fossil that turned out to be a nearly complete skeleton of a long-necked dinosaur.

And it all happened while he was walking his dog. https://t.co/nA1YxkSDXW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 众议院立法者将于下周就一项可能在美国禁用 TikTok 的法案进行投票。@jayobtv 提供了更多关于该法案的信息，该法案将 "迫使 TikTok 从其中国母公司手中出售"。#就在此地就在此刻

item.title: 当日全食把白天变成黑夜时，动物的行为会有所不同吗？研究人员将于 4 月 8 日在得克萨斯州的沃斯堡动物园回答这个问题。
item.description:
When a total solar eclipse transforms day into night, do animals act differently?

Researchers will be standing by on April 8 to answer that very question at the Fort Worth Zoo in Texas. https://t.co/OwQquCCG5k pic.twitter.com/sRaTZ6ZmK5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024
